title: (Thurs Part 1) Pick A Bit: Which Show Member Has the Best Submitted Bit? + Amy vs. Lunchbox Returns!
itunes:title: (Thurs Part 1) Pick A Bit: Which Show Member Has the Best Submitted Bit? + Amy vs. Lunchbox Returns!
description:
Lunchbox, Raymundo and Abby have all submitted bits and the rest of the show gets to decide whose they want to hear. Lunchbox wants to know if anyone has seen him on the news? Raymundo got in trouble at the gym?? And Abby’s boyfriend had to be airlifted?? Which will make it on the air?? Plus, the Return of Amy vs. Lunchbox in trivia!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
